channel.title: Sounds!
channel.description: Hi I was amazed when i logged in on Runescape after a while now. (I don't play it, i do bot! :P) The thing is, now theres voice. Recorded voice that reads the text(the one in chat window, when npc talk). All the sounds in runescape before were in MIDI. I suppose that now theres MP3 support? How possible is it to make mp3 sounds work, or maybe they do already? (Have some plans on my upcoming project - 317)

item.title: Sounds!

Long time now… Havent realeased none for like 4 months now…
